in front of.example: the cat sits in front of the window

the cat sits in front of the window.en: The cat sits in front of the window.
the cat sits in front of the window.nl: De kat zit voor het raam.

behind.example: the kitchen is behind that door

the kitchen is behind that door.en: The kitchen is behind that door.
the kitchen is behind that door.nl: De keuken is achter die deur.

next to.example: the museum is next to the church

the museum is next to the church.en: The museum is next to the church.
the museum is next to the church.nl: Het museum is naast de kerk.

to the right.example: alice sits to the right of bob

alice sits to the right of bob.antonym: alice sits to the left of bob
alice sits to the right of bob.en: Alice sits to the right of Bob.
alice sits to the right of bob.nl: Alice zit aan de rechter kant van Bob.

to the left.example: alice sits to the left of bob

alice sits to the left of bob.antonym: alice sits to the right of bob
alice sits to the left of bob.en: Alice sits to the left of Bob.
alice sits to the left of bob.nl: Alice zit aan de linker kant van Bob.

between.example: alice sits between bob and carol

alice sits between bob and carol.en: Alice sits between Bob and Carol.
alice sits between bob and carol.fi: Alice istuu Bobin ja Carolin välissä.
alice sits between bob and carol.nl: Alice zit tussen Bob en Carol.

in the middle.example: the table is in the middle of the room
nl: middenin|midden in;;Write 'midden in' if it is followed by a noun or personal pronoun, otherwise write 'middenin'.

the table is in the middle of the room.en: The table is in the middle of the room.
nl: De tafel staat in het midden van de kamer.
De tafel staat midden in de kamer.

on top of.example: the lamp is on top of the cabinet

the lamp is on top of the cabinet.en: The lamp is on top of the cabinet.
the lamp is on top of the cabinet.nl: De lamp staat op de kast.

below.example: the glass is underneath the table

the glass is underneath the table.en: The glass is underneath the table.
the glass is underneath the table.nl: Het glas staat onder de tafel.
